sentences.en: " Even this little bitch is taking liberties with me - giving me scalding hot porridge to eat!
sentences.cn: “ 连这毛丫头也来放肆了.滚热的东西就拿上来! 想烫坏我么?

sentences.en: " It's a bitch,'said Tom decisively. " Here's your money.
sentences.cn: “ 是只母狗, ” 汤姆斩钉截铁地说, “ 给你钱.

sentences.en: " With a roller on her head, the bitch can't fall asleep. "
sentences.cn: “ 这样她就打不成瞌睡了!

sentences.en: Besides , the son - of - a - bitch had guts and was honest.
sentences.cn: 再者, 这个狗养折真有种,而且正直.

sentences.en: Finally the son of a bitch walked out of one of the buildings near the runway there.
sentences.cn: 那混蛋终于从跑道附近的一幢房子里走了出来.

sentences.en: Is this a dog or a bitch?
She is the bitch from hell.
sentences.cn: 她是个坏得冒水的泼妇。
那个泼妇成天跟人吵架.

sentences.en: The silly bitch went and told the police.
sentences.cn: 那个蠢婆娘去报告了警察。

sentences.en: We'll have a bitch of a time.
You son of a bitch, they're about to call the militia.
sentences.cn: 你这个混蛋, 他们快要叫民警来了.
